pages.title: Camera
pages.text: Overview $(br2)Automated target-marking camera with remote connectivity and advanced ray detection.$(br2)Shift + Right Click to open the panel. Right Click to activate. Press Space to exit camera view.$(br)Use a Camera Connector to name and remotely link cameras.

Main Panel $(br2)$(li)Is_Sensor: Enables distance detection. When active, outputs redstone signals based on block distance.$(li)Cast Ray:$(li2)Never: No ray rendering.$(li2)Always: Always render rays (visible to all).$(li2)On Use: Render only during use (visible to user).

Main Panel $(br2)$(li)ShipOutline:$(li2)ON: Highlights physics structures.$(li2)OFF: Disables highlighting.$(li)Entity Outline:$(li2)OFF: Disable.$(li2)Target Only: Highlight centered entities.$(li2)IN View: Highlight all entities in view.$(li2)NEAREST: Highlight nearest entity.
Redstone Panel $(br2)Input options:$(li)Is_Sensor: When enabled:$(li2)If min < max, signal increases with distance (0 at min, 15 at max).$(li2)If min > max, signal decreases with distance.

Connector Panel $(br2)Right-click a camera with the connector to name it. Click X to cancel.$(br2)In the management panel:$(li)Box Button: Remotely connect (camera must be in loaded chunks).$(li)Trash Button: Delete all saved cameras.$(li)Refresh Button: Remove cameras in unloaded chunks.$(li)X Button: Delete selected camera.
